actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.
Committee on Agriculture requested executive comment from Agriculture Department.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Production, Marketing, and Stabilization of Prices

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to permit the Secretary of Agriculture to use surplus government-owned commodities to make disaster payments for the 1984 and 1985 crops of wheat, feed grains, cotton, and rice.

summary.text: Agricultural Disaster Payment-In-Kind Act of 1985 - Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to permit the Secretary of Agriculture to use Government surplus commodities to make disaster payments for the 1984 and 1985 crops of wheat, feed grains, rice, and cotton.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to permit the Secretary of Agriculture to use surplus government-owned commodities to make disaster payments for the 1984 and 1985 crops of wheat, feed grains, cotton, and rice.
